column5: We lost another avid fisherman this past weekend. Neighbour and friend passed away after battling tongue cancer for a long time. He was an avid perch, bass and salmon fisherman and frequented White River area and Squirrel Lake every year. He will be missed.  Bill
My condolences....hope his family is coping.
Very sorry to here of this Bill my heart goes out to your self and his family
Sorry to hear. Condolences to those close to him.
